content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(10, 5)
Consists of steam engine(position 10, 6), boiler(position 10, 7) and offshore pump (position 10, 8)

### Copper plate mine at position(15, 10)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 15, 11) and a furnace at position(16, 11)
- Burner mining drill (position 15, 12) and a furnace at position(16, 12)
- Burner mining drill (position 15, 13) and a furnace at position(16, 13)

### Copper cable factory at position(20, 15)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 20, 16) and a furnace at position(21, 16)
- Assembling machine at position(22, 15) and inserter at position(22, 14) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position 21, 15) that connects the furnace at position 21, 16 to assembling machine at position(22, 15)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors related to missing resources
- Check your inventory for the required resources before attempting to build or place structures.
